message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Alice, thank you for the offer. $900000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to offer $750000 for the product. I'm confident this is a fair price considering my budget and the potential value of this unique item.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a counteroffer of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
